scripts.build:run: yarn run lint && yarn run tsc
scripts.build:ci: yarn run clear-build-artifacts && yarn run tsc --removeComments false --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir ./dist-ts && yarn run copy-d-ts-files && yarn run tsc --outDir ./dist-mjs && yarn run rename-js-to-mjs && yarn run tsc --module CommonJS --outDir ./dist-cjs && yarn run format-output-files
scripts.clear-build-artifacts: rm -rf dist dist-ts dist-cjs dist-mjs build
scripts.rename-js-to-mjs: find dist-mjs -name '*.js' -type f -exec sh -c 'for f in "$@"; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.mjs"; done' -- {} +
